result.eng: The car stopped at the corner.

result.eng: The game stopped in the middle of the play.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
